text: He imanadaragana! Tomadera prati nihatadera byapare kesasa grahana kara bidhibad'dha kara hayeche. Sbadhina byakti sbadhina byaktira badalaya, dasa dasera badalaya ebam nari narira badalaya. Atahpara tara bha'iyera tarapha theke yadi ka'uke kichuta mapha kare deya haya, tabe pracalita niyamera anusarana karabe ebam bhalabhabe take ta pradana karate habe. Eta tomadera palanakartara tarapha theke sahaja ebam bisesa anugraha. Erapara'o ye byakti barabari kare, tara jan'ya rayeche bedanadayaka ayaba.
